summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Myrtle Street from East Marginal Way to Fox Avenue; and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 15584 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
